tool.name: Get.otus
tool.description: Get otus containing sequences from specified groups
tool.command: mothur_wrapper.py ## output {group_file_name}.pick.{label}.groups {list_file_name}.pick.{label}.list #import re, os.path --cmd='get.otus' --outputdir='$logfile.extra_files_path' --group="$group_in" --list="$otu" --label="$label" #if $groupnames.source == 'groups': #if $groupnames.groups.__str__ != "None" and len($groupnames.groups.__str__) > 0: --groups="$groupnames.groups" #end if #else #if $groupnames.accnos.__str__ != "None" and len($groupnames.accnos.__str__) > 0: --accnos="$groupnames.accnos" #end if #end if #set results = ["'^mothur.\S+\.logfile$:'" + $logfile.__str__] #set results = $results + ["'" + $re.sub(r'^(.*)\.(.*?)',r'\1.pick.' + $label.__str__ + r'.\2',$os.path.basename($group_in.__str__)) + ":'" + $group_out.__str__] #set results = $results + ["'" + $re.sub(r'^(.*)\.(.*?)',r'\1.pick.'+ $label.__str__ + r'.\2',$os.path.basename($otu.__str__)) + ":'" + $list_out.__str__] --result=#echo ','.join($results)

param.name: source
param.label: Select Group Names from
param.option: A History Group Name Accnos Dataset

param.name: groups
param.label: groups - Pick groups to include
param.help: At least one group must be selected

param.name: accnos
param.label: accnos - Group Names from your history

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The get.otus_ command selects otus from a list_ containing sequences from a specific group or set of groups.
.. _list: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/List_file .. _get.otus: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Get.otus
